Q_NAME: Insert an element in the array
Q_DESC:
Java program to insert an element in the array

Input Format:
First line of input is the number of elements in the array
Second line of the Input is the array elements
Third line of the Input is the element to be inserted into the array
Fourth line of the Input is the index of the array to which the new element need to be inserted.

Output format:
Print the elements of the array after the insertion.

Mandatory:

1. Create a new class Insert and the object name for the class should be obj

2. Create two methods as follows:

a. Method name = arrInsert()
b. Type = void
c. Access Specifier = public
d. Argument Type = no arguments

a. Method name = displayArray()
b. Type = void
c. Access Specifier = public
d. Argument Type = no arguments

3. Access the methods arrInsert() and displayArray() using the object name obj from the main method

4. The input details are promoted in arrInsert() and the result is printed in displayArray()
